See FunctionalTest.

Before you do so, though, please take a moment to return to the page you came from and use SixSingleQuote''''''s to turn FunctionalTests into FunctionalTest''''''s.  If you do not know what that means because you just came from http://www.extremeprogramming.org/rules/functionaltests.html, just click on the FunctionalTest link and happily move along.


Thanks for making Wiki OnceAndOnlyOnce.

''So, um, does this mean I should edit RecentChanges?  :)''

If you want. :) It gets pruned regularly anyway, so I wouldn't worry too much.

''No please do not edit RecentChanges. There is someone (me) who regularly prunes it and moves that to a monthly page. See ChangesInMonth.'' -- JohnFletcher
